text: 15.20: Stt 9.4; Kis 34.15-17; Wkp 17.10-16; 18.6-23; 1 Ko 6.9; 6.18; 8.1; Ga 5.19; Ef 5.3; Kor 3.5; 1 Pi 4.3Nza khaŋ muunga, ne nzerara, nza gava the khergip, mbe ndi maaŋv khaŋ mbe suanga. ‘Nde guma the mbarɨven tuma kargip, ana nɨma tɨgɨrga sɨk, nde ana mbɨ thari. Mba tɨv, Fhe Bakɨme ana garim, ana Fhe Bakɨme nɨman nzaŋnzaŋgi. Nde vhɨra ruarir mbigi gu gumgi wari kɨmɨ thari. Nde vhɨra guma fhɨrar fagim, rimgiap, vɨzɨn korgiap ndavar vergi sɨk, nde ana mbɨ thari. Nde vhɨra vɨzɨnan mbɨ thari.’
